Advantageous Beast.description: Gain {value}% Movement Speed and {value2}% Impairment Reduction.

Pack Leader.description: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes have up to a {value}% chance to reset the Cooldowns of your Companion Skills.

Energize.description: Lucky Hit: Dealing damage has up to a {value}% chance to restore {value2} Spirit.

Bolster.description: Fortify for {value}% of your Maximum Life when you use a Defensive Skill.

Calamity.description: Extend the duration of Ultimate Skills by {value}%.

Obsidian Slam.description: Every {value}th kill will cause your next Earth Skill to Overpower.

Overload.description: Lucky Hit: Dealing Lightning damage has up to a {value}% chance to cause the target to emit a static discharge, dealing {value2} Lightning damage to surrounding enemies.

Masochistic.description: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes with Shapeshifting Skills have up to a {value}% chance to Heal you for {value2}% Maximum Life ({value3}).

Calm Before the Storm.description: Lucky Hit: Nature Magic Skills have up to a {value}% chance to reduce the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by {value2} seconds.
